# Recent list mode
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite add -p work Alpha
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite add -p work Bravo
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite set 1 notes:updated
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite done 2

# recent mode defaults to todo and returns latest changes first
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite list --recent --limit 1
stdout 'Alpha'
! stdout 'Bravo'

# where accepts recent modifier with limit
exec ugh --db $WORK/db.sqlite list --where 'recent:1 and project:work'
stdout 'Alpha'
! stdout 'Bravo'

# repl list recent:N syntax
exec ugh --no-color --db $WORK/db.sqlite shell --file cmd-recent.txt
stdout 'Alpha'
! stdout 'Bravo'

-- cmd-recent.txt --
list recent:1 and project:work
